transcript: don't sacrifice your goals in order to network because if you accomplish your goals you have even more to offer and the network will be there for you but the reverse isn't true the less successful you become the more irrelevant you become and the less the doors stay open for you and the more you have to hustle and grift and shake hands and kiss babies and do all this business card handout but like the person who has the best network in the world is Rogan or Elon or Mr Beast like any of those people can call whoever they want up they don't need to go attend networking events
